title: saanarO I mOhamu (jaavali)
sahitya:
sAnarO I mOhamu sahimpagalEnE

anupallavi

 mAnini jAlamella mArubAri kOrvajAla

caraNam 1

 sarasAngi sAmikEmO marulaNu jEsi paravasha mattu nIvu pOyiramma muddu koDa

caraNam 2

sarasija nEtruDaina shrInivAsunipai karagiyunna nA manasu delipi ramma muddu koDa
